example.name: no second sharer
example.text: It has n't diversified beyond steel , nor has it linked up with a joint venture partner to share costs and risks .

example.text: I have never seen a case of incompetence shared by so many participants . ''

example.name: all args
example.text: One way out of that dilemma could be a partial recapitalization in which the pilots would wind up sharing the value of their concessions with public shareholders .

example.name: the workers here both leave work to be done (share) and do work (receive) in this example. This should be RARE
example.text: They all did their share of the work

example.name: Scotland is only a recepient here
example.text: Nine in ten ( 91 per cent ) of those who think Scotland gets more than its fair share of UK government spending agree that Scotland should raise its own taxes ,

example.name: arg1
example.text: Thanks to info - sharing , the internet gives an insurgency , they 're back at it , with better wiring diagrams . A week ago -LRB- Oct. 24 ' 05 -RRB- , a pressure bomb shredded a Humvee in Baqouba , tearing four GIs legs to pieces .

example.name: Args 0, 1
example.text: A guide 's endearment to his horse is vivid in his sharing of an improvised raincoat

example.name: All args
example.text: I am reading Dr. Alexander 's book , and I appreciate his sharing of the NDE with the world .

roleset.note: SHARE-N NOTES: Based on Bolt data. Comparison to share.01. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from share.01-n)
SHARING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, 'share-v.01'. No VNcls (from sharing.01-n)

example.name: unmentioned shareholders
example.text: Seeking to to overcome the currency problems , Mr. Giffen 's American Trade Consortium , which comprises Chevron Corp. , RJR , Johnson & Johnson , Eastman Kodak Co. , and Archer - Daniels - Midland Co. , has concocted an elaborate scheme to share out dollar earnings , largely from the revenues of a planned Chevron oil project .

dollar earnings , largely from the revenues of a planned Chevron oil project
